articles.title: Hockey World Cup: India stay alive after narrow loss to New Zealand; what's next? - ESPN India
articles.description: India haven't won any matches yet in the group stage but the format for the tournament is such that they still have an opportunity to go all the way.
articles.content: In the end, the numbers told the story of the match between India and New Zealand at the Women's Hockey World Cup. India earned 15 penalty corners but converted just one. New Zealand scored three goa… [+4583 chars]
